title: Carrying Cloth, 1901–50
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: paste resist and dyed using Tsutsugaki technique on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 88 x 69.5 cm (34 5/8 x 27 3/8 in.)
description: Design of a hexagonal box filled with decorated clam shells, loose painted clamshells and an ornamental braid. A family crest is at the lower right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Carrying Cloth, 1901–50.Medium: cotton
Technique: paste resist and dyed using Tsutsugaki technique on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-329.
